titleStmt.title: A copy of verses presented to all my worthy masters and mistrisses in the parish of St. Mary Newington-Buts, in Southwark by William Major, bell-man.
titleStmt.author: Major, William, bell-man.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, and tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
